name: Zombie (itch) (Fizh)
description: Rye is an orphan who was taken in by the church as a child. Before the Virus-12 outbreak he would spend his days do chores around the church to make sure it stayed clean. When the Virus-12 outbreak occurred the government provided the town Rye lives in with weapons to defend themselves from the zombies, however the town was overrun by the undead and Rye is now trapped in the church with no escape, his only choice is to fight.
